pullRequest.title: Created attribute definitions for member profile
pullRequest.bodyText:
Created attribute definition which were missing in member profile in
VO. They are now created during the initialization of Perun.

nodes.bodyText: I would prefer not to add this attribute. It is used by a single member on cesnet instance, nobody at MU/Elixir. We use user:virt attrs to show all affiliations of the user. I'll prepare a commit removing this from the profile in GUI and it can be removed from here too.
We will probably remove this attribute too, but not immediately, so you can keep it.

nodes.bodyText: I managed to remove all internal usage of member:virt:loa. Please remove it from attributes initialization. Then it can be merged. Thank you.
